name: @simple-ssi/simple-cesr
description: A simple, limited, true-to-spec implementation of the CESR protocol.

scripts.build: npx echo-cli 'Building project...' && npm run clean && npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs && npx echo-cli '\nProject built.'
scripts.build:esm: npx echo-cli 'Building ECMAScript modules...' && tsc -p ./configs/tsconfig.esm.json && npx echo-cli '{"type": "module"}' > dist/esm/package.json
scripts.build:cjs: npx echo-cli 'Building CommonJS modules...' && tsc -p ./configs/tsconfig.cjs.json && npx echo-cli '{"type": "commonjs"}' > dist/cjs/package.json
scripts.formatter: npx echo-cli 'Applying TypeScript Standard style...' && ts-standard --fix
scripts.all-tests: npx echo-cli 'Running all tests...' && npm run test && npm run standards-test
scripts.full-build: npx echo-cli 'FULL BUILD.\n' && npm run all-tests && npm run formatter && npm run build && echo-cli '\nDONE.'

author: Jonathan Rayback
